General.Name: Frontier IP Group Plc
General.Description: Frontier IP Group Plc, through its subsidiaries, identifies and evaluates commercialization of intellectual property generated by academics, universities, and other partners in the United Kingdom. The company also provides investment advisory and marketing services. Frontier IP Group Plc was incorporated in 2007 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 78 Cannon Street, London, United Kingdom, EC4N 6AF
